description: Maps the enum SafetyActivityType from safetyproto to the corresponding safety activity type [SafetyActivityType definition](https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/safetyproto/safetyactivity.proto)

schema.name: enum
schema.description: A key indicating the type of safety activity

schema.name: activity_type
schema.description: The name of the safety activity (e.g., 'CreateSafetyEventActivityType', 'VideoDownloadActivityType', 'BehaviorLabelActivityType', 'CoachingStateActivityType', 'CommentActivityType', etc.)
